name: Moonner
description:
This is a little plataformer about a guy who crashes on the Moon and has to find a new rocket to go back to Earht.

--------------------------------------------------------------

Controls:

-Directional keys:   Move.

-X:   Jump.

-R:   Restart from the last checkpoint.

-Esc:   Quit game.

--------------------------------------------------------------

This game was done by: James Table (Jaime Luis Mesa Víquez).

Twiter: https://twitter.com/_JamesTable.
